bonus_tip:
About this item
Aesthetic Decor: The reading thinker statue is a great addition to any bookshelf. It depicts a thinker reading a book, elegant and unique in design, adding aesthetic and artistic style to your home decor
Premium Material: The thinker figurine reading room decor is made of high-grade resin, sturdy and strong structure, easy to clean and maintain, and can be used for a long time
Package and Size: You will receive 1pc reading sculpture home decor, the size is about 4.53*3.35*2.36 inches, fits most decor styles and is a great addition to the collection
Widely Used: The reading statues figurines are great home decorations, adding stylish and artistic to your space. Ideal for living room, office, bedroom, library, book shelf, reading corner, coffee table, desktop decor,etc
Great Gift: The abstract art sculpture is a creative art collection, a great gift for reading lovers, librarians, student, family and more. Ideal for Birthday, Anniversary, Mother's Day, Father's Day, Christmas Day, housewarming gift, etc
